WorkItem.ClosedComment: Rawr 4.0.17 Released. If this is still an issue in this new version, please reopen the issue per the Posting Guidelines with all of the necessary information.
WorkItem.Description: Just downloaded the newest build 4.0.16 Pre-Alpha and the client crashes whenever I try to retrieve any character from Battle.net. All my characters are on Black Dragonflight and I tried multiple classes (Druid, Lock, DK). I just get the 'Application Stopped Working' message from Windows.

Comments.Message: Is this on Vista or Win7? If so can you go to Start-> All Programs -> Maintenance -> Problem Reports and Solutions -> View Problem History and view problem details for that crash and post the information. We'll try to get more exception information displayed in next release.

It is Windows 7 64bit.

That sounds like a problem with your system, not Rawr. Do you see any way Rawr could cause that, Kavan?
I had this error on two separate systems (home and work PC) both running Win 7 64-bit, while otherwise being completely different in composition. I can try and do it again on my laptop if you want.
Hmm. Perhaps it's just not actually logging the error. Is there no error when it actually crashes?

I'm experiencing the same error with this build. When I try to load a character from Battle.net I get the error "Rawr.WPF has stopped working".

I'm also using Windows 7 64-bit.

I'll attach the two error log entries associated with the crash.
Attaching second error log.
Isn't that problem history disabled on Win7 (and on), with Microsoft assuming everyone taking their development seriously is supposed to sign up for WER bucket handling on Winqual?
Having the same problems on Win7 64bit with error "Rawr.WPF has stopped working" as well.
to clarify getting this error upon trying to load my character through battle.net
I am getting the same issue on my Vista Home 32 bit system.  i have attached the error log from event viewer.   it seems to be a .net error
Just a random thought, does this happen regardless of whether you try to load from the initial welcome screen or from the File menu?
Yes, I tried both. Same problem.

This problem is occurring for me on Win 7 x64 under the following conditions:

1. Loading a Warlock from armory (welcome screen or menu).
2. Selecting Warlock class on new character (editting basic information). 

It does NOT happen when loading a sample of other character models, including DK and Druid as mentioned by the original poster. 

Have tried compatibility modes for Vista and XP.

Upon closer inspection, there may be several bugs reported here. This thread shows up under a Google search for "Rawr.WPF has stopped working", and that is what I am reporting. VS debuf info attached for Warlock load.

Unfortunately, none of what any of you have posted is actually helping us. Kavan has since added in some better error reporting so that we can try to get actual crash info (instead of OS .NET crash info which doesn't have anything useful).

I'm marking this as fixed and will close it with .17's release. AFTER THAT, if you are still getting the same issue loading characters, post a new issue and include the corrected Crash infos.
